      Get the valid coupons by type from the tables Coupon, Company_Coupon
      void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Insert the id of the customer who purchased this coupon and the id of this coupon to the table Customer_Coupon
      void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Delete coupon from the table Coupon and delete the id of this coupon from the tables Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon
      void removeExpiredCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Delete the id of this coupon from the table Company_Coupon if the coupon is expired

      Get the id of company logged in and set this id of company logged in
